full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA PHYUG RGOD MA'I 'BRAS MCHOD BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES SOGS SOG PO YUL DU RGOD MA'I 'BRAS MCHOD ZHES BYA BAR GRAGS SHING SNGA MA MCHOD PA NI, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA MIN CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I RGYAL PRAN BLON PO RNAMS RANG RANG GIS CHA MING GI 'JUG CING RANG RANG GI BSAM BZHIN BYA BA YIN, ,'DI GO RIM LAS SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD NAS LHA KLU SA BDAG SOGS SNGON DU 'JUG PA NI TSUL MIN PA'I PHYIR SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PA'I BSAM STE BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BU DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE'O, ,)
